name: Robots Need Love
description:
The year is 2012. Robots have taken over the world and humans no longer have to work, think, or do anything remotely productive. In the not-so-distant future-past, robots are seeking out other cybernetic lovers turning quad-cores into octa-cores, not to mention processing bitcoins at a pace never thought possible. It's up to you-- one of the last true matchmakers-- to get these bots to the right heart and find a lover. It's not easy though. Love never is.

Thank you all for playing!
